key.name: background-colour-active
key.description: Hex RGBA background colour for active workspace displays.

key.name: background-colour-inactive
key.description: Hex RGBA background colour for inactive workspace displays.

key.name: border-colour-active
key.description: Hex RGBA border colour for active workspace displays.

key.name: border-colour-inactive
key.description: Hex RGBA border colour for inactive workspace displays.

key.name: border-locations
key.description: Which sides of workspace displays to display a border on.

key.name: border-radius
key.description: Radius of corners, in pixels, for workspace display borders. Allows curved corners.

key.name: border-size-active
key.description: Border size/width, in pixels, for active workspace displays.

key.name: border-size-inactive
key.description: Border size/width, in pixels, for inactive workspace displays.

key.name: click-action
key.description: Action to perform when a workspace display is clicked.

key.name: cyclic-scrolling
key.description: Whether scrolling from the last workspace to the first, and vice versa, should be enabled.

key.name: font-colour-active
key.description: Hex RGBA font colour for active workspace displays.

key.name: font-colour-inactive
key.description: Hex RGBA font colour for inactive workspace displays.

key.name: font-active
key.description: Font name and size, in pt, to use for active workspace displays.

key.name: font-inactive
key.description: Font name and size, in pt, to use for inactive workspace displays.

key.name: font-colour-use-custom-active
key.description: Whether active worskpace displays should use the shell theme for the font colour.

key.name: font-colour-use-custom-inactive
key.description: Whether inactive worskpace displays should use the shell theme for the font colour.

key.name: font-use-custom-active
key.description: Whether active worskpace displays should use the shell theme for the font name and size.

key.name: font-use-custom-inactive
key.description: Whether inactive worskpace displays should use the shell theme for the font name and size.

key.name: index
key.description: Index of the workspace switcher within the panel box it is placed in.

key.name: invert-scrolling
key.description: Whether to invert the default scrolling direction.

key.name: margin-horizontal
key.description: How much margin, in pixels, to put left and right of workspace displays.

key.name: margin-vertical
key.description: How much margin, in pixels, to put above and below workspace displays.

key.name: min-height
key.description: Minimum height, in pixels, for workspace displays.

key.name: min-width
key.description: Minimum width, in pixels, for workspace displays.

key.name: mode
key.description: Which extenson mode to use. Determines how workspaces are displayed in the panel.

key.name: padding-horizontal
key.description: How much padding, in pixels, to put left and right of workspace displays.

key.name: padding-vertical
key.description: How much padding, in pixels, to put above and below workspace displays.

key.name: position
key.description: Which panel box/position to place the workspace switcher in.

key.name: show-icon-text
key.description: Whether to show the workspace name/number alongside the icon. Only has an effect in "Icon" mode.

key.name: show-names
key.description: Whether to show workspace names instead of numbers.

key.name: show-total-num
key.description: Whether to show the total number of workspaces alongside the current workspace number, when workspace numbers are used.

key.name: vertical-display
key.description: Whether to display workspaces vertically. Only has an effect in "All" mode.
